title: Lynda - Managing Documents with SharePoint 2013 with Mark Abdeln
description:
Lynda - Managing Documents with SharePoint 2013 with Mark Abdelnour
2h 10m Beginner Jun 02, 2014
Viewers: 2,600 in 66 countries Watching now: 7
Need a secure, collaborative environment for managing documents? Meet SharePoint. Author and SharePoint implementation consultant Mark Abdelnour makes the introductions, showing you the fundamentals of storing and editing different kinds of documents. Learn how to upload files, work with metadata, and create views, the windows into your data in SharePoint. Mark also shows how to share links, set ALERTSÃ¯Â¿Â¼, and use version history to keep track of who changed what when. Plus, learn how to collaborate with team members using apps, such as the Calendars and Discussion Boards apps.
